item.title: Adnoc 部门考虑投资 UGI 的丙烷业务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，阿布扎比国家石油公司（Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.【原文：A unit of Abu Dhabi National Oil Co. is considering a potential investment in UGI Corp.’s propane distribution unit AmeriGas, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: StanChart 因违反伊朗制裁规定面临 15 亿英镑索赔
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）被指控为赢得新业务而系统性地违反了伊朗制裁，在伦敦的一次审判中，渣打银行面临着价值约 15 亿英镑（19 亿美元）的投资者索赔。【原文：Standard Chartered Plc is facing about £1.5 billion ($1.9 billion) worth of investor claims at a London trial over allegations it systematically breached Iranian sanctions to win new business.】

item.title: 超微因盈利担忧跌至近两个月低点
item.description: 超级微型计算机公司（Super Micro Computer Inc.【原文：Super Micro Computer Inc. shares are seeing their biggest drop in about two months on Friday, after the maker of servers announced the date of its third-quarter results but didn’t pre-announce results.】

item.title: 潮人花苞、Netflix提价和伊朗对股市意味着什么？
item.description:
地缘政治和盈利在令人眼花缭乱的分屏中争夺华尔街的注意力

。【原文：

Geopolitics and earnings jostle for Wall Street’s attention in dizzying split screen

】

item.title: 摩根士丹利从摩根大通聘请交易员 Andy Lipsky
item.description: 据知情人士透露，摩根士丹利已聘请摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Morgan Stanley has hired Andy Lipsky, JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s vice chair of investment banking, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 了解墨西哥即将举行大选的利害关系
item.description:
阿姆洛的继任者会继续沿着他的道路前进吗？【原文：

Will AMLO’s successor continue on his path?

】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织认为欧洲经济软着陆，但对前景发出警告
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）对欧洲经济持谨慎乐观的态度，同时警告说，长期前景仍面临挑战。【原文：The International Monetary Fund struck a cautiously optimistic tone on Europe’s economy, while warning that the longer-term outlook still faces challenges.】

item.title: 巴拿马承诺实现财政目标，因为矿山关闭导致经济增长减半
item.description: 巴拿马官员本周将与评级公司会面，以加强他们对财政和增长目标的承诺，因为投资者越来越担心该国会失去投资级地位。【原文：Panamanian officials are meeting rating firms this week to reinforce their commitment to fiscal and growth targets amid rising investor concern about the country losing its investment-grade status.】

item.title: 拜登贸易部长认为中国关税审查 "很快 "结束
item.description: 乔-拜登总统的贸易主管表示，她预计 "很快 "就会就对 3,000 多亿美元中国商品加征关税的审查得出结论，而且政府一直在研究如何使关税更具战略性和有效性。【原文：President Joe Biden’s trade chief said that she expects a conclusion on a review of tariffs on more than $300 billion in Chinese goods “soon,” and that the administration has been looking at ways to make them more strategic and effective.】

item.title: 到 2050 年，非洲关键矿产产量将达到 2 万亿美元
item.description: 据国际货币基金组织称，到 2050 年，撒哈拉以南非洲可生产近 2 万亿美元的能源转型所需的金属。【原文：Sub-Saharan Africa could produce almost $2 trillion of metals required for the energy transition by 2050, according to the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 中东局势紧张，美股波动重现
item.description: 由于对地缘政治的忧虑激起了对美股大幅波动的赌注，Cboe 波动率指数自 10 月份以来首次突破 20 点。【原文：The Cboe Volatility Index popped above 20 for the first time since October as geopolitical angst stoked wagers for added swings in US stocks.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）认为欧佩克+石油输出国组织（OPEC+）7 月石油产量将因沙特经济增长而提升
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）预计，欧佩克及其合作伙伴将从 7 月开始逐步增加石油产量，这一转变将使沙特阿拉伯在明年重新跻身全球增长最快的经济体行列。【原文：The International Monetary Fund expects OPEC and its partners to start increasing oil output gradually from July, a transition that’s set to catapult Saudi Arabia back into the ranks of the world’s fastest-growing economies next year.】

item.title: 武伊契奇说，欧洲央行可以先行动，但美联储的分歧会被感受到
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员鲍里斯-武伊契奇（Boris Vujcic）表示，欧洲央行可以在美联储降息之前降息，但货币政策的长期偏离将产生后果。【原文：The European Central Bank can lower interest rates before the Federal Reserve does likewise, but a prolonged deviation in monetary policy would have consequences, according to Governing Council member Boris Vujcic.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行董事长博廷认为经济 "超级软着陆
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）执行主席安娜-博廷（Ana Botin）表示，尽管存在地缘政治风险，但全球经济状况良好，利率上调、就业强劲和经济增长尤其使贷款机构受益。【原文：Banco Santander SA Executive Chairman Ana Botin said the global economy is in a good state despite the geopolitical risks, with higher interest rates, strong employment and growth benefiting lenders in particular.】

item.title: 丹麦渡轮被迫转向以避免与俄罗斯军舰相撞
item.description: 周五早些时候，一艘丹麦渡轮被迫改变航向，以避免与丹麦海岸外的一艘俄罗斯军舰相撞。【原文：A Danish ferry was forced to change course earlier on Friday to avoid colliding with a Russian warship outside the coast of Denmark.】

item.title: 通胀数据火热，财富管理机构为投资者提供第二次机会
item.description:
价格上涨和高利率令投资者感到沮丧。但顾问们表示，顽固的价格增长 为潜在的有利可图的举措赢得了 时间。【原文：

Rising prices and high interest rates are frustrating investors. But advisers say stubborn price growth buys time for potentially lucrative moves.

】

item.title: 香港监管机构将调查普华永道在恒大审计中的作用
item.description: 香港会计监管机构表示，在接到 "举报人报告 "后，将对有关普华永道会计师事务所审计中国恒大集团的指控进行调查。【原文：Hong Kong’s accounting regulator said it will investigate allegations over PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP’s role auditing China Evergrande Group following a “whistleblower report”.】

item.title: 美联储按兵不动，华尔街优先股交易火爆
item.description: 美联储即将降息的希望逐渐破灭，这促使美国银行重新评估其优先股的成本，有可能引发这一重要资本来源的交易热潮。【原文：Fading hopes that the Federal Reserve will soon cut rates are prompting US banks to re-evaluate the cost of their preferred stocks, potentially sparking a rush of deals for the crucial source of capital.】

item.title: 习近平下令进行 2015 年以来最大规模的军队重组
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平下令对中国军队进行相当于 2015 年以来最大规模的重组，此举影响到负责网络战等能力的部队。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping has ordered what amounts to the biggest reorganization of the nation’s military since 2015 in a move that affects the force in charge of capabilities including cyber warfare.】

item.title: 尼日利亚计划首次在交易所进行原油交易
item.description: 尼日利亚的商品交易所计划提供原油和天然气交易，以深化该行业的融资渠道，因为该行业是尼日利亚最大的外汇收入来源。【原文：Nigeria’s commodities exchange plans to offer crude oil and gas trading to deepen access to financing for the industry that’s the biggest foreign-exchange earner for the nation.】

item.title: 印度利率制定者指望健康增长降低通胀
item.description: 周五的货币政策会议纪要显示，强劲的经济增长使印度的利率制定者能够在更长的时间内维持较高的利率，以确保以持久的方式降低通货膨胀率。【原文：Strong growth is allowing India’s rate-setters to maintain interest rates higher for longer to ensure inflation is lowered in a durable manner, the minutes of the monetary policy meeting showed Friday.】

item.title: 即使物价居高不下，非洲经济前景依然光明
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）表示，非洲的经济前景有所改善，但也面临着各种风险，从美元重新崛起到致命的干旱，这些风险给非洲已经经受的 "残酷鸡尾酒式 "冲击雪上加霜。【原文：Africa’s economic outlook has brightened but is facing risks that stretch from a resurgent dollar to deadly droughts that add to a “brutal cocktail” of shocks it has already endured, the IMF said.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）考虑增加向赞比亚提供的资金以帮助其应对干旱紧急情况
item.description: 赞比亚正遭受有史以来最严重的旱灾，国际货币基金组织正在与赞比亚谈判，以增加对该国的融资。【原文：The International Monetary Fund is in talks with Zambia to boost financing for the country that’s suffering the impacts of its worst drought on record, just as it emerges from a painfully slow debt restructuring process.】

item.title: 纽约梅隆财富首席信息官：买入比套现更好
item.description: 纽约梅隆银行（BNY Mellon）财富管理部门首席投资官辛妮-科尔顿-格兰特（Sinead Colton Grant）表示，美国股市从上月底创下的历史高点回落，为持有现金的投资者提供了买入的机会。【原文：The US stock market’s retreat from all-time highs set late last month is giving investors parked in cash an opening to buy in, according to Sinead Colton Grant, chief investment officer of BNY Mellon’s wealth management arm.】

item.title: 欧洲央行顶住压力坚持对银行分红的强硬立场
item.description: 在强硬派和新任监事会主席克劳迪娅-布赫（Claudia Buch）的力挺下，高级监管机构软化欧洲央行对贷款机构分红和股票回购立场的努力正在动摇。【原文：A bid by senior regulators to soften the European Central Bank’s stance on lenders’ dividends and share buybacks is faltering amid pushback from hardliners and new Supervisory Board Chair Claudia Buch.】

item.title: 美联储的不确定性给加拿大银行的麦克尔姆带来束缚
item.description: 加拿大央行越来越接近降息，但在没有得到美联储更明确信号的情况下，加拿大央行降息的幅度和速度是有限的。【原文：The Bank of Canada is getting closer to cutting interest rates, but there are limits to how far and how fast it can move without getting a clearer sign from the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 中国承诺支持知名企业在香港上市
item.description: 中国证券监管机构表示，将鼓励中国公司在香港上市，并公布了一系列措施，以加强香港作为国际金融中心的地位。【原文：China’s securities regulator said it will encourage listings by the nation’s companies in Hong Kong as it unveiled a package of measures to bolster the city’s position as an international financial hub.】

item.title: 对俄罗斯金属的制裁将考验其史诗级铁路的极限
item.description:
莫斯科官员已转向东方。事实证明，调整该国庞大的物流网络更加困难。【原文：

Moscow officials have turned east. Adapting the country’s vast logistics networks is proving harder.

】

item.title: 哈德逊湾完成 8 亿美元基金，押注特殊情况投资
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，哈德逊湾资本管理公司（Hudson Bay Capital Management）已经筹集了 8 亿多美元，用于投资所谓的特殊机会。【原文：Hudson Bay Capital Management has raised over $800 million to invest in so-called special opportunities, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 快闪族 "放弃欢乐时光，与国际象棋大师一较高下
item.description: 华尔街的后起之秀们聚集的地方不是开放式酒吧，而是摆放着棋盘的桌子。【原文：The up-and-comers of Wall Street gathered not around an open bar, but tables with chess boards.】
